product.title: DEERVALLEY Elongated Smart Toilet Bidet in White with Remote, Blackout Flush, Off-Seat Auto Flush, Heated Seat and Warm Air Dryer
product.description: The DV-1S0029 smart toilet features a bidet system, heated seat, warm water wash, air dryer, massage wash, antibacterial nozzles&seat ring, providing you with a comfortable and clean experience. It also comes with a wireless remote control, night light, and six levels of protection, enhancing usability and making your life simpler, more convenient, and safer. Users can enjoy a spa-like massage via its pulse-flushing mode. Health Benefit - Smart toilets also provide great health benefits and different washes features that can be used to improve the circulation of blood.
feature_bullets: Instant heated seat with anti-scald tech for added warmth
Easy to install with instructions and all components included
Features a soft night light for easy visibility at night
descriptive_attributes: Built-in Bidet Seat: The smart toilet features multiple wash modes with instant heating. The water temperature, water pressure, nozzle position can all be adjusted, in addition to the use of hygienic nozzle self-cleaning.
Heated Seat Toilet: The instant heated seat is featured with unique low-temp anti scalding tech to add warm care in winter.
Intelligent Air Dryer: The closed-loop heating and temperature control system provides a 4-gear adjustable temperature range of 93.2 °F to 102.2 °F for fast drying.
4 Auto-Flush Methods: Automatic flush upon standing, foot kick flush for lumbar protection, manual knob for blackout situations, and remote flush.
Blackout Flush: The side knob provides great convenience for flushing during power outages. But it requires a 9V backup battery, which not included in the product list.
Convenient Remote Control: A 2.4G wireless remote control with simple buttons is convenient for seniors and children to use. The remote control requires two AAA batteries (Not included).

Difference between Our DV-1S0029 and DV-1S0029-V3 toilets is that the DV-1S0029 lacks the sensor-activated lid, foot control for opening and closing the seat cover, and ultraviolet sterilization. All other features are the same.
Difference between Our DV-1S0029 and DV-1S0029-V1 toilets is that the DV-1S0029-V1 lacks the bidet, warm wind drying, and remote control features. All other features are the same.
Pre-wetting Rim: The pre-moistened ceramic bowl prevents dirt adhesion and makes flushing easier.

Humanized Family Care: Soft sensing light guides you in the dark and helps free you from turning on bathroom lights and worrying about difficulty falling asleep. Quiet-closing lid without any disturbance to your family.

Security: High quality with leakage protection, overheating prevention, freeze protection, flame retardant protection, over current protection, short-circuit protection, low-temperature anti-scald protection, over 100,000 times foot kick tests, and IPX4 Waterproof protection.
Installation and Usage Environment: Floor mounted, rough-in 12-inch, 110V power supply with 2.95ft power cord. Working temperature suggests 39.2 ℉ ~ 104 ℉.
Warranty: 100% factory testing and 1-year limited warranty on all mechanical parts and bidet seats.
Click here to browse our DV-1S0029 Series Toilet Premium Version: bidet, auto flush, heated seat, air dryer, UV sterilization, auto deodorization
